message.raw: clean implementation by moving SetDamping into ODEJoint class since it's the same for all derived classes.  Trigger damping coefficient update when SetDamping is called after it's already active.  Prevent repeated calling of ConnectJointUpdate by adding a flag ODEJoint::dampingInitialized.
